Less common features of succinic semialdehyde dehydrogenase deficiency include uncontrollable movements of the limbs (choreoathetosis), involuntary tensing of the muscles (dystonia), muscle twitches (myoclonus), and a progressive worsening of ataxia.",GHR,succinic semialdehyde dehydrogenase deficiency
How many people are affected by succinic semialdehyde dehydrogenase deficiency ?,Approximately 35
